title: # FernIr Python Library
summary: The FernIr Python library provides access to the FernIr API from Python.
instantiation:
```python
from my_client import FernIr

client = FernIr(api_key=<"YOUR_API_KEY">, api_secret=<"YOUR_API_SECRET">)
```
status:
This SDK is in beta, and there may be breaking changes between versions without a major version update.
Therefore, we recommend pinning the package version to a specific version in your `pyproject.toml` file. This way,
you can install the same version each time without breaking changes unless you are intentionally looking for the
latest version.
